title: Table Talk: With Al and Kitty Tait
description: Al and Kitty Tait run the Orange Bakery in Watlington, and are the authors of Breadsong: How Baking Changed Our Lives. On the podcast, the father-and-daughter pair explain how cooking changed their relationship, why baking helped Kitty out of depression, and why Watlingtons make such great customers.
itunes:author: The Spectator
dc:creator: The Spectator
